title: Does anyone have a full list of all the real life escape games worldwide? - Quora

response.answer_text: EscapeTheRoomz has compiled a directory with over 5,700 business across the world. The cool thing about this directory is that all escape room segments (escape businesses, designers, suppliers, etc.) can list their businesses. Also, ETR is looking to have an eBook directory (over 700 pages) available later this year. As of this posting, ETR is currently in beta test and should be live by the end of this month.

All escapes rooms in the United States has a full list of real life escape games in the United States with reviews and descriptions. If you're looking for escape rooms in other countries, you should check their other domains, like All escapes rooms in Britain or All escapes rooms in Germany.

In the site of escape-rooms.com you can find 953 escape rooms . You can set you location and search on the maps, like in google maps. It is realy funny, easy. I never thought that there are such an amount of escape rooms exists.
Escape Room Directory has nice list of the escape the room games worldwide and Exit Game details maintains the list of the games in the UK.
